original_text: You will want to find me, and I will be ready to meet with you. If you really want to find me,
korean_text: 너희가 온 마음으로 나를 구하면 나를 찾을 것이요 나를 만나리라

sentences.original_text: You will want to find me,
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 나를 찾고 싶게 될 것이며,

sentences.original_text: and I will be ready to meet with you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나는 너와 만날 준비가 되어 있을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: If you really want to find me,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 네가 정말로 나를 찾고자 한다면,
